Usage GuideÂ¶

### Running the Project Locally After installing dependencies, activate your virtual environment and run: `bash python manage.py runserver ` This will start the development server, and you can access the application at http://127.0.0.1:8000/.

### Creating a Superuser To create a superuser account, run: `bash python manage.py createsuperuser ` Follow the prompts to set up a username, email, and password.

### Accessing the Admin Panel Once the superuser is created, you can access the Django admin panel at http://127.0.0.1:8000/admin/. Log in using the superuser credentials you just created.
